testcaseName: Dose #1 and dose #2 of the Novavax Covid-19 vaccine.
generalDescription: This test case describes when an adult is administered the Novavax Covid-19 vaccine as the first and second dose (21 day interval) that the doses are considered valid. Another dose should be forecast.
reasonForChange:
v4.27 Added forecast for a bivalent booster
v4.25  Updated test cast to align with the current Interim Clinical Considerations on 07/20/2022 concerning the use of the Novavax Covid-19 vaccine and that two doses with an interval of 21 days is currently considered a completed series.
v4.20 Updated test case to align with Interim Clinical Considerations for "People who received Covid-19 vaccine outside of the United States" by forecasting a third dose.
